Papers to be submitted should not be previously published elsewhere.
Authors should take responsibility for issues related to plagiarism, if any.
Paper Submission can be done through Easy Chair conference management system.
Paper selection will be intimated to the authors via Email.
Registration will be confirmed only after payment of registration fee.
Accepted and Presented papers during the conference will be considered for publication.
Please, remember that for the accepted version of your paper you must fill out and sign the Consent to Publish and send it back.
At least one of the authors will be required to register and attend CHItaly 2023 to present the paper in order to have it included in the workshop proceedings.
